echo.message: cryptotest createcerts initwallet [-Dlocalhost=0] inittestpage jcspaper svg-test svg-pushmode svg-pullmode svg-play svg-pinkeyboard svg-saturnlogo -Dplayclass [-Dplayfilter]

fail.message:
-
***************************************************************
You must specify the "playclass" residing in the directory
"org/webpki/tools/svg/test/play"
using the -D option
You may also specify a "playfilter" residing in the directory
"svg-filters/play"
using the -D option
***************************************************************

param.name: cmd
param.value: -out/keyalias mykey -selfsigned -entity/ca -subject "CN=Payment Network Root CA1, C=US" -validity/start 2010-07-10T10:00:00 -validity/end 2030-07-10T09:59:59 -out/storetype PKCS12 -out/keystore ${@paymentnetworkroot}.p12 -out/storepass ${@keypassword} -out/keypass ${@keypassword} -keysize 4096 -sigalg RSA_SHA512 -serial 1
